name: aksara
description: AKSARA - Aplikasi Kontrol & Sistem Anggaran Realisasi

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.preview: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run start" "cd client && npm run preview"
